raw akas.title: Fang Qi Wo, Zhua Jin Wo

akas: Fang Qi Wo, Zhua Jin Wo (original title)
akas from release info: Fang Qi Wo, Zhua Jin Wo (original title)

1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Yi Du and Wei Wei square off in a fashion show that will determine which company will be the first in the European market.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Wei Wei wakes up from her coma and can't remember the last seven years. The company has been suffering without Wei Wei, and Yi Du has been busy poaching her best employees.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Wei Wei, Ou Ye, and Huo Xiao try to get their employees back from Yi Du. Ling Long's employees have started to notice a material difference in the way Wei Wei treats them.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: When Wei Wei has trouble coming up with a new design, Huo Xiao takes an action that comes back to bite Wei Wei.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Yi Du agonizes over what to do about Wei Wei's design. Wei Wei feel terrible when she finds out the truth.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: After insulting Tiffany's design, Yi Du gives Wei Wei three days to sell Tiffany's dress. A seemingly impossible task until Wei Wei decides to give the dress a makeover.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Wei Wei manages to convince Andrew to do the DU photoshoot. When Leo tells Wei Wei that he came back for her, she becomes more and more curious about her past.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Tiffany sends Wei Wei to close an impossible deal with a known womanizer. Yi Du is furious when he finds out.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Wei Wei is finally allowed to go back to Ling Long but she doesn't feel as happy as she expected she would. The New Trend fashion design competition is announced.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: The design competition is in full swing when Wei Wei is blindsided with the truth about her father.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: Huo Xiao investigates the fire in France. Wei Wei and Tiffany compete in the final round of the reality show.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: Wei Wei receives a chance to repay Yi Du's help when DU's sales plummet after a customer accuses them of using toxic material.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: Tiffany continues to blame Wei Wei for the toxic material scandal. Yi Du invites Wei Wei out for a feast, but the evening doesn't turn out the way she expected.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: Wei Wei gains an unexpected ally in winning over Yi Du. Tiffany tries to impress Yi Du's mother who is home from the hospital.

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: Yi Du cannot forgive Wei Wei after his mother ends up back in the hospital after a shopping expedition with Wei Wei.

16.title: Episode #1.16
16.plot: When he sees his mother form a friendship with Wei Wei, Yi Du resolves to forget the past and start over.

17.title: Episode #1.17
17.plot: Wei Wei and Yi Du have a lovely date, which is rudely interrupted by Huo Xiao.

18.title: Episode #1.18
18.plot: Ling Long and DU compete in a spirited game of laser tag, and then they are asked to compete again to design tango costumes for an international tango competition.

19.title: Episode #1.19
19.plot: As part of a plan to win Yi Du back, Wei Wei offers him a chance to co-design with her. Huo Xiao's father is angry that DU is able to be in the competition after all.

20.title: Episode #1.20
20.plot: Cao Zhong resigns when his relationship with a Ling Long employee is discovered, so Wei Wei tries to convince Yi Du to rehire him.

21.title: Episode #1.21
21.plot: Thanks to a challenge from Director Yong, Wei Wei is given a new department to oversee with a promotion on the line.

22.title: Episode #1.22
22.plot: Yi Du trains Wei Wei for her new role. Leo finds out more about Tiffany.

23.title: Episode #1.23
23.plot: While Wei Wei and her employees prepare for the press launch, Huo Xiao begins to doubt that the wedding will happen.

24.title: Episode #1.24
24.plot: Yi Du is confronted by his company's board members about his relationship with Wei Wei, who is being pressured by Chairman Huo to marry.

25.title: Episode #1.25
25.plot: Wei Wei calls off her engagement, but has second thoughts even though Yi Du is putting his company on the line for their relationship.

26.title: Episode #1.26
26.plot: Wei Wei and Yi Du spend a romantic day in Paris. Ms. Fang makes Wei Wei and Yi Du compete for her business.

27.title: Episode #1.27
27.plot: Leo tries to convince Tiffany to give up on Yi Du. Wei Wei gives up Ms. Fang's case for a surprising reason and regains more memories.

28.title: Episode #1.28
28.plot: Wei Wei is angry now that she knows Huo Xiao and Yi Du lied to her. Chairman Huo's ruse is revealed.

29.title: Episode #1.29
29.plot: Ling Long and DU compete at the Wedding Expo. Huo Xiao is blackmailed to protect Wei Wei's reputation.

30.title: Episode #1.30
30.plot: Yi Du reopens his impeachment investigation after investigating the bribes he supposedly gave to the DU board members.

31.title: Episode #1.31
31.plot: When Huo Xiao blackmails Yi Du into breaking up with Wei Wei, Tiffany and Leo try to figure out why.

32.title: Episode #1.32
32.plot: Wei Wei takes matters into her own hands concerning Huo Xiao's blackmail, but her actions negatively affect Ling Long.

33.title: Episode #1.33
33.plot: Wei Wei works on designing a dress for Ms. Cotillard so that Ling Long can rejoin the competition. Mo Fan manipulates a DU employee.

34.title: Episode #1.34
34.plot: Yi Du and his employees set out to prove Huang Kai is DU's mole. Mo Fan makes his final move.

35.title: Episode #1.35
35.plot: After Wei Wei learns the truth about her father's death, an accident puts her in the hospital. The day of the final competition is quickly approaching.

36.title: Episode #1.36
36.plot: Ms. Cotillard decides the winner of the competition. DU's attempt to hide its financial struggles is revealed.

37.title: Episode #1.37
37.plot: Wei Wei admits that she sabotaged DU and then disappears. Huo Xiao goes after the textile patent that Mo Fan has been trying to buy.

38.title: Episode #1.38
38.plot: Wei Wei shows up at Mo Fan's party and Huo Xiao tells her that he has kept her position open for her at Ling Long. Huo Xiao tries to find out what Mo Fan plans to do to Wei Wei.

imdb.plot outline: Joe "Qiao En" Chen (Easy Fortune Happy Life, Fated to Love You) and Wang Kai (Nirvana in Fire) star in a romantic drama about a woman who gets everything she ever wanted, only to realize it came at the price of the very person she wanted to share it with. Li Wei Wei (Joe Chen) is a 30 year-old fashion designer who has already achieved more than most do in their entire lives. But after an accidental drowning, she loses every memory of the last seven years. Now, in Wei Wei's mind, her life is the way it was when she was 23 years old, a young fashion design wannabe who was deeply in love with Chen Yi Du (Wang Kai). Seven years ago, they were inseparable. Today, he is a bitter ex. Confused by what caused this seemingly sudden change, Li Wei Wei investigates, only to learn that the hectic life of a success-driven designer essentially engulfed not just the love she shared with Chen Yi Du, but also the charming, dreamy-eyed girl that she was seven years ago. Meanwhile, as Li Wei Wei begins to regret her recent actions, the person most directly impacted by this change is Qi Cheng (singer actor Qiao "Kimi" Ren Liang), her current fiance who is doing everything in his power to stop his love from reconnecting with her ex, and to also rekindle the relationship they had prior to the accident. Li Wei Wei, however, has decided that she is once again going to be the person she was before the success that took her old life from her. But can she ever get back everything she has lost without losing everything she has achieved? Stay With Me is directed by the team of Ruan Wei Xin, Chen Guo Hua and Billy Tang, with script writing by Qian Jing Jing and Xu Zi Yuan. Lead Qiao En Chen, a.k.a. Joe Chen, also acts as producer for the drama, alongside Yu Yue. The series proved to be the last for actor Qiao Ren Liang, known fondly to his fans as "Kimi," who committed suicide after a long battle with depression less than a year after the release of this drama. Stay With Me debuted on Hun
imdb.title: Stay with Me
